tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE exploratory_missions (
  mission_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  launch_date DATE,
  destination_planet VARCHAR(50),
  discovery_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Mission (
    mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    launch_date DATE,
    landing_date DATE,
    mission_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Discovery (
    discovery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_id INT,
    discovery_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    discovery_description TEXT,
    discovery_date DATE,
    discovery_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Planet (
    planet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    planet_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    planet_type VARCHAR(50),
    discovery_id INT,
    planet_discovery_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Spacecraft (
    spacecraft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    spacecraft_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    spacecraft_type VARCHAR(50),
    mission_id INT,
    launch_site VARCHAR(100)
);
